name: Twisted Screens
storyline:
In Twisted screens, you take control of Tessa an employee of Razzycat entertainment as she find herself in a abandoned entertainment facility where horrible experiments have taken over and roam free, Tessa must team up with a A.I Assistant 'Legsy' as they uncover the truth of this once beloved company.

A.T.R video entertainment company has been shut down for 30 years now, ATR was known for pushing the boundaries of technology and what it could do. And always innovating on new things. But after an unknown event that caused the entire company to shut down Razzycat Entertainment bought the entire company and all their IPs.
summary: In Twisted screens, you take control of Tessa an employee of Razzycat entertainment as she find herself in the Abandoned ATR facility with horrible experiments running loose in the facility. Tessa must team up with A.I companion Legsy to escape.
